connect20/eadesigndev_ifmobile.name: connect20/Eadesigndev_Ifmobile

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/eadesigndev_ifmobile.description: The extension will add the possibility to check if the browsing is done from mobile devices. Also if you enable and add the fields in the system/configuration you will be able to separate ski css/js.
